title: processor architectures
extract: The word "architecture" typically refers to building design and construction. ... The design of the processor determines what software can run on the computer and what other hardware components are supported. For example, Intel's x86 processor architecture is the standard architecture used by most PCs.Apr 4, 2012
extract_html: The word "architecture" typically refers to building design and construction. ...
